ygData.subject: Empath's Discovery (Please take note, everyone)

Subject: Empath's Discovery (Please take note, everyone)

After an apparently interminable search, Empath finds a cave from 
which a soft blue light is coming.  Entering the cave, she finds it 
empty, except for an artifact of some description.  It is a sphere 
about the size of a bowling ball - and it is from this device that the 
light comes.

The whispering voices in Empath's head grow louder as she nears this 
strange object.  Hardly realizing what she's doing, the Seeker reaches 
out and picks up the glowing ball.  An energy surge rushes through her 
body, and she blacks out ...

When she awakes, the alien sphere - "Soul Orb", something tells her - 
is still in her hand.  Reaching out tentatively with her mind, she 
finds that her mental powers have multiplied upon themselves many 
times over, and she can sense every transformer on the planet: where 
they are, who they work for, what they're doing.

But something else has happened: in claiming the Soul Orb, Empath has 
unwittingly awakened its companions scattered across the three 
continents.  A quiet, but easily noticeable call reaches out from the 
devices and touches the minds of several of the planet's inhabitants 
...

OOC: Empath's Galvapred chip has been fried by the power surge, 
allowing her old personality to surface - the one that hates Galvatron 
for selling Skywarp's soul to Unicron in exchange for another soldier. 
 (She was his girlfriend.)  Also, the bots who feel the psionic call 
of the Soul Orbs are, in no particular order: Rodimus Prime, Meteara, 
Skulletron, Phoenix, and Owlhawk.  There are three Soul Orbs total, in 
random locations - Empath has found one.  Everyone will, of course, be 
affected in his or her own way by these things.
